name: Chop-Chop
tagline: Full-stack Web And App Development Services
description:
We are a thriving hub of web development zealots and tech explorers. 9 years of experience in solving the problems of designers, developers, business owners and end-users taught us how to translate design into quality code through creative collaboration.
Our clients are digital & marketing agencies, startups and other online businesses from several time zones. We know that communication is paramount to modern offshore collaboration so we combine agile web development process with attentive project management. Not forgetting the family-like and always-creative atmosphere that usually accompanies our work.
We are expert frontend developers. Thanks to rigorous training, we create websites which:
Rank high on Google PageSpeed Insights,
Contain advanced JS interactions,
Are easy to extend and integrate with a backend or API.
Chop-Chop offers fully editable custom Wordpress themes with backend and functionalities tailored to your individual needs. If you need a light-weight, bespoke template built from the ground up, we are the team you are looking for.
We build and grow complex Web Apps and PWA using frameworks like React.js, Vue.js, and Node.js. You can rely on our busy workshop of fullstack engineers, ready to become a part of your team and your mission. Whether you are planning an MVP, releasing your app, or scaling your product, you can count on us.
Our focus is on the next-generation web that is cross-platform, user-driven and search-optimized.
